description: Replacement of roof tiles & related components including hip tiles & flashings with Rosemary Red Clay Classic Plain tiles
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s) 1305-P/EX&P/01 - Location Plan & Existing & Proposed Site Plan, 1305-P/EX&P/02 - Existing & Proposed Roof Plan & Front Elevation, 1305-P/EX&P/03 - Existing & Proposed Rear & Side Elevations, Design & Access Statement - 6 September 2019, Rosemary Clay Classic Product Data Sheet (Edition 08.2019/v1)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall be Rosemary Red Clay Classic Plain Tiles

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the Brentham Garden Estate, in accordance with Policies 7.4, 7.6 & 7.8 of the London Plan (2016) and Policies 7.4, 7.6, 7B & 7C of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012).
